xuiCodeItem
directive in module xui

Description

This component is used for displaying code snippets in a listview. It supports line numbers and custom content after the code snippet.

Usage

as element:
<xui-code-item
       content="{string}"
       [lang="{string}"]>
</xui-code-item>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
contentstring

The source code to be displayed.

lang
(optional)
string

Programming language used (auto-detect if not present) - see https://highlightjs.org/static/demo/ for possible values.
